entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
